Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Jill
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter for her Xmas gift - she loves it and has been using it every day.

Reviews.Title: very good mobile camera
Reviews.Author: Anthoneal Zephyr
Reviews.Content: Yeah just good for what I want it for nice camera the video is great just wish it had flash

Reviews.Title: SONY SMARTPHONE ATTACHABLE CAMERA.
Reviews.Author: Cora Peterson
Reviews.Content: The Sony smartphone attachable camera I like it to the point that I giggle with joy of how much I enjoy taking photos from long distance.

ProductInfo.Features:
16 GB Micro SD Memory Card
USB 2.0 High Speed Memory Card Reader
Touch Screen Stylus Pen
Digital Camera Carrying Case
Flexible Mini Table-top Tripod and 3pc. Lens Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Sony DSC-QX10/B DSC-QX10 DSCQX10B QX10 QX10B (Black) Smartphone Attachable 4.45-44.5mm Lens-Style Camera BUNDLE with 16GB High Speed Micro SD Card, Carrying Case, Smartphone Stylus, Table Tripod, All in One USB Card Reader and Lens Cleaner
